forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Windy with showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Windy with showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 55F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High around 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
